Everything I‚Äôve learned about the industry - technologies, processes, and procedures - has all been self-taught: Exploration through reading, attending conferences, hands-on learning, talking to field experts, and attending specific trainings.

I am highly organized, I love building helpful, concise documentation focused on engagement and learning. I care about outcomes. I optimize towards thoughtfulness, then action: Move deliberately and fix things.

I care very deeply about people, and believe that treating folks with kindness and respect in the workplace should have, at a minimum, equal care and weight as OKRs, KPIs, or other business objectives, as it‚Äôs people that complete those business objectives. Hiring is expensive. Teams are immutable. Focus and psychological safety are important to the health of any business.

I can tell you all about the amazing, smart, incredible people I‚Äôve had the distinct honor and privilege to work with. I can tell you about that one time I made 10+ muppet-style puppets to put on a show with two of my favorite people to send a love letter to our favorite conference talks for one of my favorite programming languages.
